title: 437. Sew with Batiks Successfully
description:
Learn the tools and techniques that will help you successfully sew with batiks. We also share ideas for organizing your digital patterns, must-know tips for using a rotary cutter, and creative ideas for labeling your quilt. We also explore tips for growing your social media accounts with expert Kim Niedzwiecki of Go-Go Kim.  Let's dive in.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
